full_summary:
# Request for Proposal
### Phase 2: Paint Pots Trail and Boardwalk Rehabilitation in Kootenay National Park

#### Reference Number
ProCurement ID: 5P468-23-0135/A

#### Tender Announcement Date
Aug 10, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
Aug 24, 2023, 16:00:00 (Mountain Time)

## Contract Details

* Country: Canada
* Province: British Columbia
* Expected Contract Start Date: Aug 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Sep 14, 2023

## Solicitation Process

This is the second stage of a two-stage solicitation process:

1. **Qualifications Evaluation**: The first stage consisted of evaluating the qualifications of interested suppliers.
2. **Financial Bid Invitation**: The second stage invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid for the project, as per specifications and drawings.

## Tender Description

Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a financial bid for the rehabilitation of the approximately 1 km long Paint Pots Trail in Kootenay National Park. The project entails the removal of deteriorated boardwalk sections and the construction of a new 175m long boardwalk. The work must be executed without the use of heavy equipment on the backcountry trail. Materials will be transported by helicopter to and from a designated staging area.

## Evaluation Method

The selection of the contractor will be based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements

This tender adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information

* Name: Ken Lacanilao
* Email: [kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca](mailto:kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (587) 832-1894

Note: All necessary contact information and documents can be found in the original procurement notice. I have not included them in the rewritten version, as they are better provided directly from the source. You are encouraged to visit the original notice for more details and accurate information.
